author: dtp2-tpg-am
body:
#### PR description:

This pull request contains the latest version of the phase-2 DT trigger-primitive generation for the L1T upgrade.  The code is completely standalone and does not require any external code or any other PR to run.  Furthermore, the code does not interfere with the central CMS workflows. The code is still in an early development phase, but this version has been used to prepare the L1T TDR results and it is stable enough to be used by other experts. 

#### PR validation:

The code has been extensively validated (and already integrated) in the  L1T integration branch linked https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/view/CMSPublic/SWGuideL1TPhase2Instructions
title: DT TPG for Phase-2 L1T upgrade
